entry.title: Meet Jekyll - The Static Site Generator

link.title: Meet Jekyll - The Static Site Generator

entry.summary: Jekyll is a static site generator that transforms your plain text into beautiful static web sites and blogs. It can be use for a documentation site, a blog, an event site, or really any web site you like. It’s fast, secure, easy, and open source. It’s also the same site generator I use to maintain my open source documentation. Today, we’ll be installing and configuring Jekyll using the C...
